name: Satcom-station
tagline: A satellite communication ground station based on the SatNOGS design
body:
### Welcome to the Satcom Sation Project
This is a joint project between Derek Kozel (@dkozel) and Jerzy Dziewierz (@jerzydziewierz) to design and build a satellite communications ground station based on the [SatNOGS](https://satnogs.org/) project (@satnogs).

### Antennas
The first antenna is a UHF Helical antenna tuned for 437 MHz. It is based off of the [SatNOGS](https://github.com/satnogs/satnogs-antennas/) design, but the 3D printed components have been redesigned and resized.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
